name: Sly Groundpound
description:
Information

Sly Groundpound is a endless runner which was created by me and my friends for the Global Game Jam 2019 in Skövde (Sweden).

Can be played by a keyboard or xbox controller (unsure if other controllers work, so test it out if you would like)

Works only on windows (i think? not sure)

Controls:

Keyboard:

Left Arrow = Left (in menu)

Right Arrow = Dash or Right (in menu)

Up Arrow /W = Jump or Up (in menu)

Down Arrow /S = Ground pound or Down (in menu)

D/X = Dash

Space/z  = Jump

Xbox Controller:

 Up on the d-pad  or A = Jump

Down on the d-pad = Ground pound

Right on the d-pad / X = Dash

Credits:

Programmers:

Christos Kalanidis, 

Lukas Lagerholm, 

Christoffer Thalin

Designer & Artist:

Music:
